articles.author: Paul Withers
articles.title: Putin nightmare as Hungary and Austria cave on veto over EU-wide ban on Russian oil - Express
articles.description: VLADIMIR Putin has suffered a huge blow after countries including Hungary and Austria reportedly caved on a veto over a European Union-wide ban on Russian oil.

articles.title: May Day rallies in Europe urge more help as inflation bites - The Associated Press
